name: Versuchskaninchen
description:
Welcome to Cunic Labs - A research Facility specializing in Bunny experiments. You've spent more time down here than you can remember, but now... IT'S ENOUGH!

You're tired of the same Routine every day, just eating sleeping and the occasional Death, you're sick of it all. It's time to get up on your back feet and get out of there.

Slip into the role of an immortal Versuchskaninchen and solve Puzzles on your way to freedom. (Heavily inspired by TLoZ, Happy Tree Friends and old Flash Games)

*Note: Currently in Development: suspended for an indefinite period of time
